Text: Commandant.
At this moment... are you feeling nervous?
I've rehearsed this scene... countless times in my heart,
yet as I step into this grand hall... and hear the bells chime, my heart still flutters.
I believe it's because... you're standing right here... before me.
Through our days together... a myriad of... indescribable emotions... have gradually blossomed... right here in my heart.
Admiration, reliance, and trust...
They're sincere and fervent... yet insufficient, to express all that I feel for you.
If you will... allow me to be a bit more selfish—
I want to give you this ring, as a testament to my vow:
Whatever the future may hold, until the end of time... or even life itself, I will never part from you.
Commandant, I, Lucia, was born for you…
and I will forever... be by your side on the path ahead.

Oh...
Do you hear that? The flowers and the wind...
They have something... To say to us... I must tell you.
Let me put it into lyrics...
Here it goes—
"I love you."

I worry that my dance doesn't express my feelings, so allow me to do it again.
I ask not for devotion, nor for promises of forever.
I only desire connection...
this precious time... where your gaze meets mine...
